original: @80a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @80a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'a rya bha n'a ra ka ma nydzu shr'i pa ra ma aa rtha stu ti n'a ma /
analyzed: a'a rya bha n'a ra ka ma nydzu shr'i pa ra ma aa rtha stu ti n'a ma /
translated: ƒÄryabha·πáƒÅraka-ma√±ju≈õrƒ´pƒÅramƒÅrtha-stuti-nƒÅma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba //
analyzed: 'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba //
translated: The Praise of the Ultimate, Called the Praise of the Noble Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´

original: 'jam dpal gzon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, the youthful one.

original: byon pa ma lags bzhud mi mnga' //
analyzed: byon pa ma lags bzhud mi mnga' //
translated: You do not come, nor do you go.

original: bzhengs pa ma lags bzhugs mi mnga' //
analyzed: bzhengs pa ma lags bzhugs mi mnga' //
translated: You do not rise, nor do you sit.

original: 'jig rten pa las shin tu 'das //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa las shin tu 'das //
translated: You are utterly beyond the world.

original: tshig las 'das pa'i spyod yul lags //
analyzed: tshig las 'das pa'i spyod yul lags //
translated: You are the domain of the inexpressible.

original: mgon po khyod la ji ltar bstod //
analyzed: mgon po khyod la ji ltar bstod //
translated: How can I praise you, O protector?

original: 'on kyang 'jig rten btags rten gyis //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'jig rten btags rten gyis //
translated: Nevertheless, in dependence on worldly conventions,

original: khyod ni ci 'dra de bzhin du //
analyzed: khyod ni ci 'dra de bzhin du //
translated: just as you are,

original: bdag gis gus pas bla ma bstod //
analyzed: bdag gis gus pas bla ma bstod //
translated: I respectfully praise my guru.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes te //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes te //
translated: You are not inherently born,

original: khyod la skye ba yong mi mnga' //
analyzed: khyod la skye ba yong mi mnga' //
translated: and you do not possess birth.

original: mgon po gshegs dang byon mi mnga' //
analyzed: mgon po gshegs dang byon mi mnga' //
translated: O protector, you do not come or go.

original: dngos med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: dngos med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, who are not a thing.

original: khyod la dngos dang dngos med min //
analyzed: khyod la dngos dang dngos med min //
translated: You are neither a thing nor a non-thing.

original: chad pa ma lags ther zug min //
analyzed: chad pa ma lags ther zug min //
translated: You are not annihilated, nor are you eternal.

original: khyod rtag ma lags mi rtag min //
analyzed: khyod rtag ma lags mi rtag min //
translated: You are not permanent, nor are you impermanent.

original: gnyis med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: gnyis med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage to you, who are free from duality.üîΩYou are not red, green, purple,

original: dmar dang ljang dang le @80b brgan dang // ser dang dkar dang gnag ma lags //
analyzed: dmar dang ljang dang le @80b brgan dang // ser dang dkar dang gnag ma lags //
translated: yellow, white, or black.

original: khyod la kha dog yong mi mnga' //
analyzed: khyod la kha dog yong mi mnga' //
translated: You do not possess any color.

original: mdog bral khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: mdog bral khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage to you, who are free from color.üîΩYou are not large or small,

original: khyod ni che dang chung ba dang / sbom dang phra ba khyod min te //
analyzed: khyod ni che dang chung ba dang / sbom dang phra ba khyod min te //
translated: not thick or thin.

original: ring dang thung ba'i khams ma lags //
analyzed: ring dang thung ba'i khams ma lags //
translated: You are not the elements of long or short.

original: tshad med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: tshad med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage to you, who are immeasurable.

original: shes pas srid la mi gnas shing //
analyzed: shes pas srid la mi gnas shing //
translated: Through wisdom, you do not abide in existence,

original: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas te //
analyzed: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas te //
translated: and through compassion, you do not abide in peace.

original: mya ngan 'das dang 'khor mi gnas //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das dang 'khor mi gnas //
translated: You do not abide in nirvana or samsara.

original: mi gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: mi gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage to you, who do not abide.

original: chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing //
analyzed: chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing //
translated: You do not abide in any phenomena,

original: chos kun rtogs par thugs su chud //üîΩmchog tu zab pa nyid brten pa //
analyzed: chos kun rtogs par thugs su chud // mchog tu zab pa nyid brten pa //
translated: yet you have realized all phenomena.üîΩYou are the support of supreme profundity.

original: zab pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: zab pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage to you, who are profound.

original: de ltar bstod na bstod bgrang gi //
analyzed: de ltar bstod na bstod bgrang gi //
translated: If one praises in this way, then how could one praise you

original: gzhan du khyod la ji ltar bstod //
analyzed: gzhan du khyod la ji ltar bstod //
translated: in any other way, O you who are praised by the assembly of sages?

original: chos rnams thams cad stong pa la //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad stong pa la //
translated: All phenomena are empty,

original: su la bstod cing su yis bstod //
analyzed: su la bstod cing su yis bstod //
translated: so to whom is there praise, and by whom is there praise?

original: mtha' ma mchis shing dbus ma mchis //
analyzed: mtha' ma mchis shing dbus ma mchis //
translated: Without end, without middle,

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'i //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'i //
translated: free from the duality of object and subject,

original: rtog bral khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: rtog bral khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, who are free from conceptualization.

original: bla ma mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi //
analyzed: bla ma mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi //
translated: This is the ultimate praise of the name of the noble protector Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´,

original: don dam yang dag mtshan brjod pa'o //
analyzed: don dam yang dag mtshan brjod pa'o //
translated: the ultimate and true praise.

original: bsod nams 'di yis 'jig rten 'di //
analyzed: bsod nams 'di yis 'jig rten 'di //
translated: By this merit, may the worldüîΩbecome like the Sugata.

original: bde bar gshegs pa 'dra bar shog /'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa 'dra bar shog /'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The ultimate praise of the noble Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, composed by the great master NƒÅgƒÅrjuna, is completed.
